title: The NA Forums are not registering my Level
body: I am currently unable to make a post in team recruitment because the forums does not register that i am over level 6. how do i fix this?

replies.body: Since you're posting for the first time, your account has to sync up to the boards.  It looks like you're showing as level 7 now so you can post without issue on team recruitment.  Let me know if it's still an issue!
